{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$2.6M in 2020-2021 on contracts with KEYDATA ASSOCIATES.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [KEYDATA ASSOCIATES INC.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22KEYDATA%20ASSOCIATES%20INC.%22)
- [KeyData Associates Inc.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22KeyData%20Associates%20Inc.%22)
{{< /details >}}
